verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that \w Nebuzar-adan|strong="H5018"\w* the \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* had let him \w go|strong="H7971"\w* from \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, when he had \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* him being \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* in \w chains|strong="H0246"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* all that were carried away \w captive|strong="H1546"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, which were carried away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* unto \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.\f + \fr 40.1 \ft chains: or, manicles\f*

And the \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w* this \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.

Now the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \add it\add*, and \w done|strong="H6213"\w* according as he hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w*: because ye have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and have not \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* his \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, therefore this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* is come upon you.

And now, behold, I \w loose|strong="H6605"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* from the \w chains|strong="H0246"\w* which \add were\add* upon thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. If it seem \w good|strong="H2896"\w* unto thee to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* with me into \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w come|strong="H0935"\w*; and I will look \w well|strong="H7760"\w* unto thee: but if it seem \w ill|strong="H7489"\w* unto thee to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* with me into \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, \w forbear|strong="H2308"\w*: \w behold|strong="H7200"\w*, all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee: whither it \w seemeth|strong="H0413"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* and \w convenient|strong="H3477"\w* for thee to \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, thither \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.\f + \fr 40.4 \ft were…: or, are upon thine hand\f*\f + \fr 40.4 \ft I will…: Heb. I will set mine eye upon thee\f*

Now while he was not yet gone \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, \add he said\add*, Go \w back|strong="H7725"\w* also to \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, whom the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* hath made \w governor|strong="H6485"\w* over the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* with him \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: or \w go|strong="H3212"\w* wheresoever it seemeth \w convenient|strong="H3477"\w* unto thee to \w go|strong="H3212"\w*. So the \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him \w victuals|strong="H0737"\w* and a \w reward|strong="H4864"\w*, and let him \w go|strong="H7971"\w*.

Then \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* unto \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* to \w Mizpah|strong="H4708"\w*; and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* with him \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that were \w left|strong="H7604"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ Now when all the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w forces|strong="H2428"\w* which \add were\add* in the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, \add even\add* they and their \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* had made \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* \w governor|strong="H6485"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and had \w committed|strong="H6485"\w* unto him \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w women|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w children|strong="H2945"\w*, and of the \w poor|strong="H1803"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, of them that were not carried away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*;

Then they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* to \w Mizpah|strong="H4708"\w*, even \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, and \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* and \w Jonathan|strong="H3129"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, and \w Seraiah|strong="H8304"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Tanhumeth|strong="H8576"\w*, and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephai|strong="H5778"\w* the \w Netophathite|strong="H5200"\w*, and \w Jezaniah|strong="H3153"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of a \w Maachathite|strong="H4602"\w*, they and their \w men|strong="H0582"\w*.

And \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto them and to their \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* not to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*: dwell \w in|strong="H3427"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and it shall be \w well|strong="H3190"\w* with you.

As for me, behold, I will \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* at \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5975"\w* the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, which will \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto us: but ye, \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* ye \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, and summer \w fruits|strong="H7019"\w*, and \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add them\add* in your \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in your \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* that ye have \w taken|strong="H8610"\w*.\f + \fr 40.10 \ft to serve: Heb. to stand before\f*

Likewise when all the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* that \add were\add* in \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, and among the \w Ammonites|strong="H5983"\w*, and in \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, and that \add were\add* in all the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*, \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* had \w left|strong="H5414"\w* a \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and that he had \w set|strong="H6485"\w* over them \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*;

Even all the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* returned \w out|strong="H7725"\w* of all \w places|strong="H4725"\w* whither they were \w driven|strong="H5080"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, to \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w*, unto \w Mizpah|strong="H4708"\w*, and \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* and summer \w fruits|strong="H7019"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w*.

¶ Moreover \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, and all the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w forces|strong="H2428"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* to \w Mizpah|strong="H4708"\w*,

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Dost thou \w certainly|strong="H3045"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that \w Baalis|strong="H1185"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w* hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w* to \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* thee? But \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* \w believed|strong="H0539"\w* them not.\f + \fr 40.14 \ft to slay…: Heb. to strike thee in soul?\f*

Then \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* in \w Mizpah|strong="H4709"\w* \w secretly|strong="H5643"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Let me \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, I pray thee, and I will \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, and no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \add it:\add* wherefore should he \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* thee, that all the \w Jews|strong="H3064"\w* which are \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* unto thee should be \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*, and the \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* in \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*?

But \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Johanan|strong="H3110"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kareah|strong="H7143"\w*, Thou shalt not \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*: for thou \w speakest|strong="H1696"\w* \w falsely|strong="H8267"\w* of \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*.
